putOnGroundDoerobject

english.t[5898]

Superclass
Tree

Property
Summary

Method
Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

Make putting something on a Floor object or throwing something at a Floor object equivalent to dropping it; since this depends on the English-language grammar of the actions concerned it needs to appear in the English-specific part of the library. **`putOnGroundDoer`**` :   `[`Doer`](../object/Doer.html)
